title: Doubling time and exponential growth relationship

content.prompt: Which of the following best characterizes a population that is growing exponentially with time?

choices.label: Equal increases in number over equal increments of time
Doubling in size over equal increments of time
Reaching a maximum then experiencing a rapid decline
Growing at a rate proportional to the square root of time

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe environmental concepts and processes.
